Feature Values

q_g q --˃ /g/ only
q_g_affr1 q --˃/g/ + affrication (in the environment of anterior vowel) ǵ
q_g_affr2 q --˃/g/ + affrication (in the environment of anterior vowel) ǧ
q_hamza q --˃ /ʔ/
q_q q --˃ /q/
q_k_emph q --˃ emphatic k
q_j q --˃ /j/

Description

Uvular realisation is preserved in MSA loanwords, ex. taqrīban «approximately», qarīban «soon» and in some Turkish loanwords, ex. qawūn «melon» and by young speakers often in words realized with /g/ or /ǧ/ by older speakers, ex. gidīm or ǧidim - qadīm «old», gilīl or ǧilīl - qalīl «few, little» ; Devoicing of /g/ to /k/ in contact with /t/, ex. k-t-l (which sometimes becomes affricated in the environment of an anterior vowel c-t-l)

Instances

Dialect Basra
Source The Beginnings of Word Order Change in the Arabic Dialects of Southern Iran in Contact with Persian: A Preliminary Study of Data from Four Villages in Bushehr and Hormozgan
Examples ana nǝlg()a(q_g)h fi s-suq(q_g).
